name: SlashingStickman
description:
Controll : A ,D to Move, W to Jump, Press the buttons for Normal Slash and Abilities

Game information : 6 Abilities you can use to defend and kill the monsters, after you kill the monsters, the Energy balls of monsters will come to the stickman to add exp to level up. If you leave the fighting scene to the menu, the game will remember your level so when you came back it's still the same level.
